other_title: D・N・A² - Dokoka de Nakushita Aitsu no Aitsu (Japanese)
D・N・A² 〜何処かで失くしたあいつのアイツ〜 (Japanese)
plot: Junta's great granddaughter goes back in time in order to make Junta stay as the Megaplayboy so she can continue to exist. Along with her comes an old man with the intension of making Junta staying as the Megaplayboy forever for his own purposes. When he starts getting attacked he has no choice but to return to being the Megaplayboy in order to protect his loved ones.
